original_text: And he went there to Naioth in Ramah. And the Spirit of God came upon him also, and as he went he prophesied until he came to Naioth in Ramah.
korean_text: 사울이 라마 나욧으로 가니라 하나님의 영이 그에게도 임하시니 그가 라마 나욧에 이르기까지 걸어가며 예언을 하였으며

sentences.original_text: And he went there to Naioth in Ramah.
And the Spirit of God came upon him also,
until he came to Naioth in Ramah.
